person.persName: Calvin Fuller (Wayne County, West Virginia, farmer and soldier)

body.p: Wayne County, West Virginia, farmer and soldier. Virginia native. Married to Margarett McGalley Fuller in Pike County, Kentucky, on February 23, 1834. Father of Apperson Fuller, Irvin Fuller, Marion Fuller, Thomas Fuller, Arveline Fuller, Elizabeth Fuller, Jefferson Fuller, James E. Fuller and Francis M. Fuller. Farmer in Pike County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in Wayne County, Virginia in 1860. Served in the 9th West Virginia Infantry as private in 1862. Served in the Round Bottom Company of the Virginia State Militia (U.S.A.) as captain from 1862 to 1864.
